nodes.text: An ancient tumulus dating back to ancient times was discovered on Tatooine at the time of the Galactic Civil War by archeologist Schardak. According to Schardak, this tomb was built roughly 100,000 years before the Imperial Era, and its builders were the first civilization to have lived on the planet.

An ancient mummy wrapped in metallic cloth was discovered in the tumulus. Analysis revealed this mummy was cursed by ancient magic and was in fact a monster whose aim was to rule the galaxy by investing Palpatine's body.
This mysterious tumulus was created by Jean Balczesak for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario Le Dieu mort which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 66.
The builders of the tumulus might have been the Kumumgah, as they once were a technologically-advanced race of Tatooine in the pre-Republic era.
